name: Traffic City - Multiplayer Game
description:
In Traffic City , Join the mutiplayer Community! Now you can Select your teams, create rooms , Share Your Viecle with Passengers. 

Live Chat enabled ! Get  clear and full view of your amazing city! As a Metropolis you are in a rush to make errands around the Densely trafficked streets! It's a good thing you have your reliable Mustang to drive around! Practice your curb apeal and escape the dreaded traffic without a scratch! Can you beat their score?!
